title: Poro Skin Sejuani
body:
Hi was just wondering if there's any other way to get Poro Skin now besides spending a fortune on Hextech boxes. Eg, can I get mystery gifts for Sejuani specifically for her skin and hope for the best because she's only for a few skins ? Or it doesn't work like that? 

Help please ! As I really want Sejuani poro skin

replies.body: Indeed! The Poro Sejuani skin is a Snowdown skin, which typically go on sale around the December months. Additionally, yes, you can get the skin from Mystery Gifts, as the skin is Legacy and not Limited or Mythic. Hope that helps!
